settings.text: Amanita muscaria increases efficiency and creates harmony between the brain and body
settings.heading: Amanita muscaria

settings.text: Meet the Amanita muscaria mushroom, a fabulous mushroom with real benefits. Feeling stressed? Amanita muscaria can help you relax by acting as a cozy blanket for your mind. Looking for a creative boost? Amanita muscaria will boost your creativity and bring back inspiration

settings.about_heading: Amanita muscaria: From Ancient Rituals to Modern Benefits
settings.about_text: Amanita muscaria, often recognized by its bright red cap with white spots, has a storied history in various cultures around the world. Used for centuries by Siberian shamans in their spiritual rituals, this mushroom was believed to aid in communication with the spirit world and enhance mystical experiences. Known as the 'fly agaric,' it also found its way into European folklore, often depicted in fairy tales and myths. While our ancestors revered it for its mystical properties, modern research has revealed its potential to enhance efficiency, boost creativity, and encourage relaxation

settings.heading: Benefits of Amanita muscaria Mushroom
settings.text: Research suggests that Amanita muscaria holds a range of promising benefits, particularly in cell protection and neuroprotection. It shows potential in areas such as cardiovascular protection, liver health, managing inflammation, and reducing oxidative stress.
settings.studies_reference: Wagner A, Pehar M, Yan Z, Kulka M. Amanita muscaria extract potentiates production of proinflammatory cytokines by dsRNA-activated human microglia. Front Pharmacol. 2023 Apr 12;14:1102465. doi: 10.3389/fphar.2023.1102465. PMID: 37124206; PMCID: PMC10130647.

settings.heading: Don't wait
settings.text: — take the step towards a sharper, more balanced you today.
